verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as made בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> be-tzal-'El And Bezaleel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron the ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <WH520> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko, [was] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah of it and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo, the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah of it and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> ko-ma-To. the height

וַיְצַפֵּ֛הוּ <WH6823> vay-tzap-Pe-hu And he overlaid זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor it with pure מִבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> mib-Ba-yit within וּמִח֑וּץ <WH2351> u-mi-Chutz; and without וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and made ל֛וֹ lo זֵ֥ר <WH2213> zer a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. to it round about

וַיִּצֹ֣ק <WH3332> vai-yi-Tzok And he cast ל֗וֹ lo, אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> 'ar-Ba' for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, of gold עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' [to be set] by the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <WH6471> pa-'a-mo-Tav; corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> u-she-Tei of it even two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and צַלְעוֹ֙ <WH6763> tzal-'O side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat, upon the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> u-she-Tei of it and two טַבָּע֔וֹת <WH2885> tab-ba-'ot, rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and צַלְע֖וֹ <WH6763> tzal-'O side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Nit. upon the other

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made בַּדֵּ֖י <WH905> bad-Dei staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> za-Hav. them with gold

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> bat-tab-ba-'Ot, into the rings עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> tzal-'Ot by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron; of the ark לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> la-Set to bear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָרֹֽן׃ <WH727> ha-'a-Ron. the ark

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made כַּפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> kap-Po-ret the mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor; [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <WH753> 'a-re-Kah, [was] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and one cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah. the breadth

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei two כְרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> che-ru-Vim cherubims זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <WH4749> mik-Shah beaten out of one piece עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah made אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> mish-she-Nei he them on the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ke-Tzot ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret. of the mercy seat

כְּרוּב־ <WH3742> ke-ruv- cherub אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> 'e-Chad One מִקָּצָה֙ <WH7098> mik-ka-Tzah on the end מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh, the one וּכְרוּב־ <WH3742> u-che-ruv- cherub אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> 'e-Chad on this side and another מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> mik-ka-Tzah on the [other] end מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh; the other מִן־ <WH4480> min- with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret on that side out of the mercy seat עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim he the cherubims מִשְּׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> mish-she-Nei on the two; קִצְוֹותֹו kitz-vo-tov כקְצֹותָֽיו׃ <WH7118> ke-tzo-Tav. end ק

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu had הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <WH6566> po-re-Sei spread out כְנָפַ֜יִם <WH3671> che-na-Fa-yim [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> le-Ma'-lah, on high סֹֽכְכִ֤ים <WH5526> so-che-Chim [and] covered בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <WH3671> be-chan-fei-Hem with their wings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret, over the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> u-fe-nei-Hem with their faces אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; to another אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- were toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret, [even] to the mercy seatward הָי֖וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu had פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei were the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim. of the cherubims פ Peh

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָ֖ן <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan the table עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <WH753> a-re-Ko [was] the length וְאַמָּ֣ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo, the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> ko-ma-To. the height

וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf And he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor; it with pure וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and made ל֛וֹ lo זֵ֥ר <WH2213> zer thereunto a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as Also he made ל֥וֹ lo מִסְגֶּ֛רֶת <WH4526> mis-Ge-ret thereunto a border טֹ֖פַח <WH2948> To-fach of an handbreadth סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; round about וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as and made זֵר־ <WH2213> zer- a crown זָהָ֛ב <WH2091> za-Hav of gold לְמִסְגַּרְתּ֖וֹ <WH4526> le-mis-gar-To for the border סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. thereof round about

וַיִּצֹ֣ק <WH3332> vai-yi-Tzok And he cast ל֔וֹ lo, אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; of gold וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> hat-tab-ba-'Ot, the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' upon the four הַפֵּאֹ֔ת <WH6285> hap-pe-'Ot, corners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher were לְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> le-'ar-Ba' that [were] in the four רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> rag-Lav. feet

לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> le-'um-Mat Over against הַמִּסְגֶּ֔רֶת <WH4526> ham-mis-Ge-ret, the border הָי֖וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> hat-tab-ba-'Ot; were the rings בָּתִּים֙ <WH1004> bat-Tim the places לַבַּדִּ֔ים <WH905> lab-bad-Dim, for the staves לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> la-Set to bear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan. the table

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <WH7848> shit-Tim, [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; them with gold לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> la-Set to bear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan. the table

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכֵּלִ֣ים׀ <WH3627> hak-ke-Lim the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- were on הַשֻּׁלְחָ֗ן <WH7979> hash-shul-Chan, which [were] upon the table אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קְעָרֹתָ֤יו <WH7086> ke-'a-ro-Tav his dishes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כַּפֹּתָיו֙ <WH3709> kap-po-Tav and his spoons וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et מְנַקִּיֹּתָ֔יו <WH4518> me-nak-ki-yo-Tav, and his bowls וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַקְּשָׂוֹ֔ת <WH7184> hak-ke-sa-Vot, and his covers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יֻסַּ֖ךְ <WH5258> yus-Sach to cover בָּהֵ֑ן <WH2004> ba-Hen; withal זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> ta-Hor. [of] pure פ Peh

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah the candlestick זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor; [of] pure מִקְשָׁ֞ה <WH4749> mik-Shah [of] beaten work עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah he the candlestick יְרֵכָ֣הּ <WH3409> ye-re-Chah his shaft וְקָנָ֔הּ <WH7070> ve-ka-Nah, and his branch גְּבִיעֶ֛יהָ <WH1375> ge-vi-'Ei-ha his bowls כַּפְתֹּרֶ֥יהָ <WH3730> kaf-to-Rei-ha his knops וּפְרָחֶ֖יהָ <WH6525> u-fe-ra-Chei-ha and his flowers מִמֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah at הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> ha-Yu. become

וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah And six קָנִ֔ים <WH7070> ka-Nim, branches יֹצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> yo-tze-'Im going out מִצִּדֶּ֑יהָ <WH6654> mitz-tzid-Dei-ha; of the sides שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה׀ <WH7969> she-lo-Shah thereof three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> ke-Nei branches מְנֹרָ֗ה <WH4501> me-no-Rah, of the candlestick מִצִּדָּהּ֙ <WH6654> mitz-tzid-Dah side הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad, out of the one וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah thereof and three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> ke-Nei branches מְנֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> me-no-Rah, of the candlestick מִצִּדָּ֖הּ <WH6654> mitz-tzid-Dah side הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni. out of the other

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah Three גְ֠בִעִים <WH1375> Ge-vi-'im bowls מְֽשֻׁקָּדִ֞ים <WH8246> me-shuk-ka-Dim made after the fashion of almonds בַּקָּנֶ֣ה <WH7070> bak-ka-Neh branch הָאֶחָד֮ <WH259> ha-'e-Chad in one כַּפְתֹּ֣ר <WH3730> kaf-Tor a knop וָפֶרַח֒ <WH6525> va-fe-Rach and a flower וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah and three גְבִעִ֗ים <WH1375> ge-vi-'Im, bowls מְשֻׁקָּדִ֛ים <WH8246> me-shuk-ka-Dim made like almonds בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> be-ka-Neh branch אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad in another כַּפְתֹּ֣ר <WH3730> kaf-Tor a knop וָפָ֑רַח <WH6525> va-Fa-rach; and a flower כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> ken for לְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> le-She-shet so throughout the six הַקָּנִ֔ים <WH7070> hak-ka-Nim, branches הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> hai-yo-tze-'Im going out מִן־ <WH4480> min- out הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah. of the candlestick

וּבַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> u-vam-me-no-Rah And in the candlestick אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah [were] four גְבִעִ֑ים <WH1375> ge-vi-'Im; bowls מְשֻׁ֨קָּדִ֔ים <WH8246> me-Shuk-ka-Dim, made like almonds כַּפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ <WH3730> kaf-to-Rei-ha his knops וּפְרָחֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6525> u-fe-ra-Chei-ha. and his flowers

וְכַפְתֹּ֡ר <WH3730> ve-chaf-Tor And a knop תַּחַת֩ <WH8478> ta-Chat was under שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> she-Nei under two הַקָּנִ֜ים <WH7070> hak-ka-Nim branches מִמֶּ֗נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah, and a וְכַפְתֹּר֙ <WH3730> ve-chaf-Tor of the same and a knop תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> she-Nei under two הַקָּנִים֙ <WH7070> hak-ka-Nim branches מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah, and a וְכַפְתֹּ֕ר <WH3730> ve-chaf-Tor of the same and a knop תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei under two הַקָּנִ֖ים <WH7070> hak-ka-Nim branches מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah; for לְשֵׁ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH8337> le-She-shet of the same according to the six הַקָּנִ֔ים <WH7070> hak-ka-Nim, branches הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> hai-yo-tze-'Im going out מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nah. at
